name: COLTON UNDERWOOD LEGACY FOUNDATION
description: Non-profit improving access to mental health care
sampleDescriptions: Educate policymakers on issues related to youth mental health, including the challenges faced by student-athletes. Monitor issues related to telehealth state licensure.
Educate policymakers on issues related to youth mental health, including the challenges faced by student athletes. Monitor issues related to telehealth state licensure.
Educate policymakers on issues related to youth mental health, including the challenges faced by student-athletes. Monitor issues related to telehealth state licensure.
Monitor issues related to college-athlete mental health, including S.2966, A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to encourage programs to address college athlete mental health.
